CallSession.title: CallSession
CallSession.description: Represents a video or audio call session between users.

id.description: Unique identifier for the call session.

callerId.description: Reference to the User initiating the call. (Relationship: User 1:N CallSession)

calleeId.description: Reference to the User receiving the call. (Relationship: User 1:N CallSession)

startTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the call started.

endTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the call ended.

status.description: Current status of the call session (e.g., 'ongoing', 'completed', 'missed').

sharedFileIds.description: References to shared files during the call session. (Relationship: File N:N CallSession)

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the SashaLeads AI application.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL to the user's profile picture.

bitsteckTeamId.description: Reference to the Bitsteck team the user belongs to. (Relationship: BitsteckTeam 1:N User)

sashaConsultingTeamId.description: Reference to the Sasha Consulting team the user belongs to. (Relationship: SashaConsultingTeam 1:N User)

File.title: File
File.description: Represents a file shared within the application, e.g., during a call or in chat.

url.description: URL where the file is stored.

uploadTimestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the file was uploaded.

uploaderId.description: Reference to the User who uploaded the file. (Relationship: User 1:N File)

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Secured by user ID. Each user can only access their own profile.

/users/{userId}/files/{fileId}.description: Stores files uploaded by a specific user. Secured by path-based ownership (user ID).

/call_sessions/{callSessionId}.description: Stores call session details for WebRTC signaling. Authorization is controlled by the 'callerId' and 'calleeId' fields. Only participants can access call session data.
